docs.title: Welcome drifty's docs!
docs.text: Hey there! I curate a bunch of links for stuff on here, and try to represent what I have learnt so others can also follow my steps

docs.title: Welcome to my docs!
docs.text:
This place should serve as a link bucket mainly, for stuff I host or own, but it will also have handy guides to do everything I did with steps etc.

This is new, I'm still figuring it out, please bear with me and hopefully this is fruitful.

docs.title: Happy new years eve!
docs.text:
We hope you are all having fun and wish you all the best for the new year!
